content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 2, Inter Milan 0.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 2, Inter Milan 0.
Corner,  Inter Milan. Conceded by John Terry.
Attempt blocked. Jonathan (Inter Milan) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Patrick Olsen.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Yuto Nagatomo.
Michael Essien (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Juan Jesus (Inter Milan).
Foul by David Luiz (Chelsea).
Ishak Belfodil (Inter Milan) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Chelsea. Michael Essien tries a through ball, but Ramires is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Demba Ba (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by David Luiz.
Cristian Chivu (Inter Milan) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Cristian Chivu (Inter Milan).
Juan Mata (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Fernando Torres (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Ramires.
Substitution, Inter Milan. Patrick Olsen replaces Fredy Guarín.
Substitution, Inter Milan. Alessandro Capello replaces Rodrigo Palacio.
Substitution, Inter Milan. Juan Pablo Carrizo replaces Samir Handanovic.
